container.heading: Information Required on Prescriptions or Patient Drug Profiles

section.heading: Information Required on All Original and Refill Prescriptions or Patient Drug Profiles or Computerized Patient Drug Records.
section.text: In addition to the information required by law on every prescription, patient drug profile, or computerized patient drug record, the following information shall be legibly entered on all original and refill prescriptions or patient drug profiles or computerized patient drug records:

para.text: The date of filling or refilling;
The initials of, or other identifying symbol for:
The pharmacist responsible for filling or refilling the prescription; and
The data-entry pharmacy technician involved in the dispensing process.

section.heading: Access to Records.
section.text: The information required in Regulation .01 of this chapter shall be readily retrievable for inspection during business hours by authorized personnel.
